content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or preferences. However, I can tell you that some of The Tangent's albums have received critical acclaim and are considered fans' favorites. "Not as Good as the Book" and "Le Sacre du Travail" are often cited as some of their strongest concept albums. "The Music That Died Alone" is also regarded as a classic in the progressive rock genre. Ultimately, it depends on personal taste and what style or theme one prefers.
